title: 1999/334/EC: Commission Decision of 7 May 1999 on certain protection measures with regard to registered horses coming from South Africa (notified under document number C(1999) 1176) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 7 May 1999
on certain protection measures with regard to registered horses coming from South Africa
(notified under document number C(1999) 1176)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/334/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall prohibit the temporary admission, transits and imports of registered horses from the Metropolitan area of Cape Town in South Africa.

Member States shall amend the measures they apply with regard to South Africa to bring them into line with this Decision.
They shall inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 May 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
